titles.title: 333 I Take Thy Promise Lord (simple tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I take Thy promise
Lord in all its length
And breadth and fullness
As my daily strength
Into life's future
Fearless I may gaze
For Savior Thou
Art with me all the day

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Days may be coming
Fraught with
Loss and change
New scenes surround my
Life and fancies strange
I thank Thee that
No day can ever break
Savior when Thou
Wilt leave me or forsake

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There may be days of
Darkness and distress
When sin has power to
Tempt and care to press
Yet in the darkest day
I will not fear
For mid the shadows
Thou wilt still be near

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Days there may be of
Joy and deep delight
When earth seems fairest
And her skies most bright
Then draw me closer
To Thee lest I rest
Elsewhere my Savior
Than upon Thy breast

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And all the other
Days that make my life
Marked by no special
Joy or grief or strife
Days filled with quiet
Duties trivial care
Burdens too small
For other hearts to share

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Spend Thou these days
With me - all shall be Thine
So shall the darkest hour
With glory shine
Then when these earthly
Years have passed away
Let me be with Thee
In the prefect day
